problem: Feeling stressed and overwhelmed due to end-of-qarter tasks, schedule falling behind, and lack of sleep from noisy roommate
solution: Break tasks down into smaller, manageable chunks, set realistic expectations, prioritize tasks, practice self-care, address noisy roommate by talking to them about the issue, setting boundaries, finding compromise, and seeking support when needed

problem: Feeling lonely and homesick being away from family
solution: Set up regular calls or video chats with family, explore opportunities to make new friends, join clubs or activities, take things at own pace, seek support from therapist or counselor if needed

problem: Nervous about fitting in and making new friends in a photography club
solution: Use photography as a common interest to start conversations, be yourself, take it one step at a time, focus on shared interests, show genuine interest in getting to know others, be patient with the process, and believe in the ability to forge new friendships
